message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a smaller share, let's get this over with!
Meeting you in the middle, but I'm still hoping for a better deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
Last chance to make a fair deal, Bob! Don't be greedy!
You're running out of chances, Alice. Take it or leave it!
This is my final offer, Bob. Meet me in the middle or walk away!
